# numspot Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "numspot" {
  numspot_host  = ""
  client_id     = ""
  client_secret = ""
  space_id      = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `client_id` (String) Client ID to authenticate user.
- `client_secret` (String) Client secret to authenticate user.
- `numspot_host` (String) Numspot API Host
- `space_id` (String) Space ID.
